# Problem 6.2 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A force F = 150 lb is applied to a hand crank that is stuck and will not turn. If L = 10 in. and y = 5 in., determine the maximum shear stress due to torsion in the crank rod between A and B. Assume the crank has diameter d = 0.5 in.
